external_references.description: Mandiant. (2022, May 2). UNC3524: Eye Spy on Your Email. Retrieved August 17, 2023.

description: [APT29](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0016) has installed a run command on a compromised system to enable malware execution on system startup.(Citation: Mandiant APT29 Eye Spy Email Nov 22)
